hero.title: Discover, Publish, and Share Stories from Around the World
hero.subtitle: Empowering Children Through Stories
hero.description: A global non-profit platform connecting writers, educators, and students through the power of storytelling

discover.title: Discover Global Stories
discover.description: Access a rich library of stories from children in underserved communities worldwide

publish.title: Publish Your Stories
publish.description: Share your voice with the world through our collaborative publishing platform

learning.title: AI-Enhanced Learning
learning.description: Interactive word explanations and content parsing for better understanding

empowerment.title: Seeds of Empowerment
empowerment.description: Supporting children in underserved communities through education and storytelling

diversity.title: Global Diversity Initiative
diversity.description: Celebrating diverse voices and perspectives from every corner of the world

english.title: English Language Learning
english.description: Interactive stories designed for English language learners

cta.title: Join Our Global Community
cta.description: Start discovering, creating, and sharing stories today

hero.title: Our Mission: Empowering Children Through Stories
hero.subtitle: Connecting voices from underserved communities with the world

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: We believe every child has a story worth sharing. 1001 Stories is a global non-profit platform dedicated to discovering, publishing, and sharing stories from children in underserved communities.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.text: Through our Seeds of Empowerment program, we reinvest all revenue back into supporting children's education and creative expression in underserved communities worldwide.

platform.title: Our Platform
platform.text: 1001 Stories connects writers, educators, and students through an innovative multi-role system that facilitates discovery, learning, and creative expression.

technology.title: AI-Enhanced Learning
technology.text: Our platform leverages AI technology to provide interactive word explanations, content parsing, and educational assistance, making stories more accessible and engaging for learners worldwide.

community.title: Our Community
community.text: Join a global network of storytellers, educators, and learners committed to celebrating diversity and empowering the next generation through the power of stories.

testimonial1.quote: 1001 Stories has transformed how we approach literacy in our classroom. The diverse collection of voices helps students see themselves in the stories.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.quote: Being able to share my story and see it published gave me confidence I never knew I had. Now I help other children find their voice too.
testimonial2.author: Maria Gonzalez

firstStory.name: First Story
firstStory.description: Submit your first story to the platform

missionVision.tagline1: Where Every Smile Has a Story :
missionVision.tagline2: Where Stories Become Learning, and Learning Becomes Stories.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Our mobile storytelling program, 1001 Stories, brings meaningful learning to some of the hardest to reach populations around the world. We aim to facilitate the creation, development, and gathering of 1001 empowering stories from every participating local community.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.description: We believe every child carries the spark of an Einstein. Books inspire learning, and learning awakens potential. Our vision is a world where every child has access to education ‚Äî a place where imagination can grow without limits.

welcome.title: Welcome to 1001 Stories! üéâ
welcome.description: Discover and share stories from children around the world
welcome.content: 1001 Stories is a non-profit educational platform that shares stories from children in underserved communities and connects educators and learners worldwide.

myBookshelf.title: My Bookshelf
myBookshelf.content: You can check books assigned to you by your teacher. You can also see your reading progress and completion status at a glance.

library.title: From Library
library.content: Explore interesting stories from children in other countries. We'll recommend books that match your age and interests.
